html: Amongst UK 16-24 year olds: 50% have never heard of Lenin. 70% have never heard of Mao. 72% have never heard of Pol Pot. I think this helps explain why so many are prepared to back those (including Corbyn) who have flirted with the totalitarian far-left.
text:
Amongst UK 16-24 year olds: 

50% have never heard of Lenin. 
70% have never heard of Mao. 
72% have never heard of Pol Pot. 

I think this helps explain why so many are prepared to back those (including Corbyn) who have flirted with the totalitarian far-left.
